traits.name: Divided Mind
traits.desc: The Wendigo Spawn still has some memories from its host body, granting it advantage on all Wisdom saving throws.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Wendigo Spawn  makes one warhammer and one bite attack against the same target.

actions.name: Warhammer
actions.desc: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage.
